content.metaTitle: VILLA LAUREL - Luxury New Build Villa Jávea €1,975,000
content.metaDescription: Contemporary 4-bed villa with sea views in exclusive Torre Ambolo, Jávea. 231m² luxury living on 1305m² plot. Pool, terraces & modern design.
content.heroIntro:
Discover VILLA LAUREL, an exceptional contemporary villa nestled in the exclusive Torre Ambolo area of Jávea, where luxury meets Mediterranean sophistication. This stunning south-facing property commands breathtaking sea views from its privileged 1,305m² plot, offering an unparalleled blend of modern architecture and natural beauty that defines the essence of Costa Blanca luxury living.

With its clean lines and bright, airy spaces, VILLA LAUREL has been masterfully designed to maximize the indoor-outdoor lifestyle that makes Jávea so desirable. The 231m² of thoughtfully planned living space flows seamlessly between four elegant bedrooms, four bathrooms, and expansive social areas that open directly onto panoramic terraces and a stunning private pool. This is more than a home – it's your gateway to the ultimate Mediterranean lifestyle in one of Spain's most coveted coastal destinations.

locationSection.intro:
Torre Ambolo represents the pinnacle of exclusive living in Jávea, positioned on elevated terrain that captures stunning panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea and the iconic Montgó Natural Park. This prestigious neighborhood is renowned for its privacy, tranquility, and proximity to some of the Costa Blanca's most beautiful beaches, including the famous Ambolo Beach with its crystal-clear waters and dramatic cliff formations.

Jávea itself stands as the jewel of the Costa Blanca, where traditional Spanish charm meets international sophistication. The town offers an exceptional quality of life with over 320 days of sunshine annually, world-class dining, championship golf courses, and a thriving expat community. The strategic location provides easy access to Valencia (1.5 hours) and Alicante airports (1 hour), making it perfectly positioned for both permanent residence and holiday home ownership.
highlights: Exclusive Torre Ambolo location with prestigious neighbors and enhanced privacy
10-minute drive to Jávea's historic town center and world-class marinas
Walking distance to pristine Ambolo Beach and stunning coastal walking trails
Easy access to championship golf courses at Jávea Golf Club and La Sella
Strategic position between Valencia and Alicante with excellent transport links

propertyFeatures.intro: VILLA LAUREL showcases contemporary Mediterranean architecture at its finest, with every detail carefully considered to enhance comfort, privacy, and connection with the stunning natural surroundings. The intelligent two-floor design maximizes both sea views and natural light while creating distinct zones for relaxation and entertainment.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and abundant natural light
4 modern bathrooms including en-suite facilities with premium fixtures
Open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows and sea views
State-of-the-art kitchen with central island and high-end appliances
Expansive terraces perfect for al fresco dining and entertaining
Private swimming pool as the centerpiece of outdoor living
Landscaped gardens designed to complement the natural Mediterranean setting
South-facing orientation ensuring optimal sunlight throughout the day
Contemporary architecture blending seamlessly with the coastal landscape
Premium construction materials and energy-efficient design features

content.investmentSection:
VILLA LAUREL represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Europe's most sought-after coastal markets. Jávea's luxury property sector has demonstrated remarkable resilience and growth, with new build villas in premium locations like Torre Ambolo consistently appreciating in value. The combination of limited land availability, strict planning regulations, and ever-increasing international demand creates a compelling investment environment for discerning buyers.

The rental potential for luxury villas in Jávea is particularly strong, with properties of this caliber commanding premium weekly rates during peak season (€3,000-€5,000+ per week) and maintaining steady occupancy throughout the extended Mediterranean season. The growing trend toward luxury vacation rentals, combined with Jávea's reputation as a premier destination for high-net-worth individuals, ensures strong rental yields and long-term capital appreciation potential for properties like VILLA LAUREL.

Contemporary design maximizing indoor-outdoor Mediterranean lifestyle
Move-in ready luxury villa with building license already secured

Premium 1,305m² plot offering privacy, space, and future development potential

Exceptional rental income potential in high-demand luxury market segment

faqs.question: What is the total price for VILLA LAUREL and what payment options are available?
faqs.answer: VILLA LAUREL is priced at €1,975,000 for this exceptional 4-bedroom villa with sea views in Torre Ambolo. Payment schedules can be arranged with the developer Miralbo Urbana S.L., typically involving a reservation deposit, construction milestones, and final completion payment.

faqs.question: What makes Torre Ambolo in Jávea such a desirable location?
faqs.answer: Torre Ambolo is one of Jávea's most exclusive neighborhoods, offering elevated sea views, privacy, and proximity to pristine beaches. The area is renowned for its luxury villas, natural beauty, and easy access to both Jávea's amenities and the stunning Montgó Natural Park.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for this new build villa in Spain?
faqs.answer: The process involves signing a reservation contract, arranging Spanish legal representation, conducting due diligence, and completing purchase through a Spanish notary. The property comes with building license already secured, streamlining the acquisition process for international buyers.

faqs.question: Can I obtain a Spanish mortgage for VILLA LAUREL?
faqs.answer: Yes, Spanish mortgages are available for international buyers, typically offering 60-70% financing for non-residents. We can connect you with specialist mortgage brokers through our Habeno partnership to explore your financing options.

faqs.question: What rental income potential does this villa offer?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Torre Ambolo command premium rental rates of €3,000-€5,000+ per week during peak season. With Jávea's extended rental season and high demand for luxury accommodations, annual rental yields of 4-6% are achievable with professional management.

faqs.question: When will VILLA LAUREL be completed and available for occupation?
faqs.answer: With building license already secured, construction timelines can be confirmed with developer Miralbo Urbana S.L. Typical completion periods for new build villas of this specification range from 12-18 months from construction commencement.

faqs.question: What is included in the purchase price of VILLA LAUREL?
faqs.answer: The price includes the completed villa, landscaped gardens, swimming pool, and all fixtures and fittings as specified. Detailed specifications including kitchen appliances, bathroom fixtures, and finishing materials will be provided upon viewing arrangement.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of VILLA LAUREL?
faqs.answer: Contact us directly via WhatsApp or phone (+34 634 044 970) to schedule a private viewing. We can also arrange virtual tours for international clients and provide comprehensive information packages including site plans and specifications.

faqs.question: Are there any additional costs beyond the purchase price?
faqs.answer: Additional costs typically include Spanish property transfer tax (10% in Valencia region), legal fees (1-1.5%), notary and registration fees, and ongoing costs like community fees and property taxes. We provide detailed cost breakdowns for all prospective buyers.

faqs.question: What makes VILLA LAUREL unique compared to other properties in Jávea?
faqs.answer: VILLA LAUREL combines contemporary Mediterranean architecture with an exclusive Torre Ambolo location, offering sea views, premium construction quality, and optimal south-facing orientation. The generous 1,305m² plot provides exceptional privacy and outdoor living space in this prestigious neighborhood.

content.conclusion: VILLA LAUREL represents a rare opportunity to secure a luxury contemporary villa in one of Jávea's most exclusive locations, combining breathtaking sea views, premium construction, and exceptional investment potential. Don't miss this chance to own a piece of Mediterranean paradise – contact us today via WhatsApp or call +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing and take the first step toward your Costa Blanca dream home.
